snippet: BABKOW--Kathleen G. Happy Birthday and Happy St. Valentines Day. The world has lost a gem - you are truly one of a kind and will be in our thoughts forever. Alvin, Jonathan, David, Knox, Zachary, Maia and Rosalyn 1/3
lead_paragraph: BABKOW--Kathleen G. Happy Birthday and Happy St. Valentines Day. The world has lost a gem - you are truly one of a kind and will be in our thoughts forever. Alvin, Jonathan, David, Knox, Zachary, Maia and Rosalyn 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BABKOW, KATHLEEN G
